markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Master Summoner](/Feats.aspx?ID=2912) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 69 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

During daily preparations, you can designate one of your spell slots to become two summoning slots of the same spell level, from which you can cast only summoning or [incarnate](/Traits.aspx?ID=388) spells.

<title level="2">Master Summoner leads to...</title>
[Legendary Summoner](/Feats.aspx?ID=2943)
name: Master Summoner
